item.title: Mime and lumbi guide are refusing to talk, unlike santa
item.dc:creator: @1337_king 1337 king
item.description:
@1337_king wrote:

Make sure you’ve put the closeing tags in the right place.
Because when i was new to server editing, i had the same problem.

[code]if (npcs.npcType == 1552)
{
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3)
{
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “Welcome to crandorscape!”;
}
}

if (npcs.npcType == 1056)
{
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3)
{
npcs.updateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs.textUpdate = “See forums for updates!”;
}
}
[/code]
Make sure you have 2 "}"s at the end for both them, so the first one wont wreck the second. The same could happen if you are makeing dialogue and its even harder to fix. Hope i could help.
(if you get an even worse error, then you need to delete a “}” after the second script.)

Read full topic

item.title: Mime and lumbi guide are refusing to talk, unlike santa
item.dc:creator: @tim_moughtin tim_moughtin
item.description:
@tim_moughtin wrote:

i use testscape, here is my npchander.java:

this is santa talking:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1552)
{
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3)
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “Welcome to crandorscape!”;

he talks fine in vaorrok square, when i want the mime next to him to say somehting the mime wont speak:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1056)
{
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3)
{
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = “See forums for updates!”;

what is wrong?
